result.execSummary:
The defendant Sidney Mykal Sheridan was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Sidney Mykal Sheridan in court with attorney Puck Tsai.  Defendant Sidney Mykal Sheridan in custody.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  No Contest Plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court finds Def. guilty.  Court imposes sentence.

Count 1:
$443.00 costs, 60 days to pay or set up a payment plan.
30 Days in Sauk County Jail, with huber, consecutive.  
20 days credit
Provide DNA Sample
Paperwork handed in court.

Pre-trial conference at 03-04-2016 11:15 am.
Return date at 03-15-2016 01:00 pm.

Defendant Sidney Mykal Sheridan by video from LEC with attorney Melville Peter Middleton.  Defendant Sidney Mykal Sheridan in custody.  Michael X. Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Middleton states cases and appearances.  Atty Middleton rec'd copies of complaints in all matters, waives readings.  State requests $250 cash bond in each case for a total of $750.00 w/conditions on 16CM41.  Atty Middleton responds.  DE does qualify for PD appt.  Court sets $200 cash bonds in all matters for a total of $600.00.  DE waives time limits.  Bond continued.

16CM41 - $200.00 cash bond set - No contact w/Ho-Chunk Casino
16CF11 - $200.00 cash bond set
15CM595 - $200.00 cash bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 4, 2016 at 11:15 am.  Return date scheduled for March 15, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Sidney Mykal Sheridan not in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant was incarcerated in Jackson County Jail.  Pending warrant issues.    Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant.  Begin bond forfeiture.

Pre-trial conference at 01-08-2016 11:00 am.
Return date at 01-20-2016 01:00 pm.

Defendant Sidney Mykal Sheridan appeared by video means with Attorney Raabe. Prosecuting Atty Sue Mueller appeared for State of Wisconsin.    Defendant waives reading of complaint. Advised rights to an attorney.  Defendant has not yet applied.  Attorney Raabe give explanation.  State gives bond argument and request $500 cash bond.  Attorney Raabe argues bond.  Defendant was walking, not driving.  Can post small amount.  File set for pre-trial conference/return date.  Reinstates $150.00 previous bond.  Special bond conditions as follows:  Absolute sobriety at all times.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 8, 2016 at 11:00 am.  Return date scheduled for January 20, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Sidney Mykal Sheridan not in court.  Dennis Joseph Ryan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant.  Begin bond forfeiture.  Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing scheduled for January 4, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
